## Summary

The energy sector in 2026 will be balancing commodity volatility with surging electricity demand from AI and electrification. Midstream assets offer stable, fee-based returns, while integrated majors maintain capital discipline. The five stocks highlighted here include traditional oil, midstream and utilities that are positioned for growth.
